programme.title: My Art
programme.desc: Ellie Shine (Laurie Simmons) is a single artist living in New York City. Ellie has a good life: a stable teaching job, successful friends, and a loyal, aging dog named Bing. As her decades-old dream of a respectable place in the art world becomes more elusive, her frustration with her lack of recognition feels alarmingly urgent. When she is offered the summer house and studio of a famous friend she seizes the opportunity to hit the reset button on her life and work. She unwittingly finds inspiration in two out-of-work actors who maintain the gardens at her summer retreat.

programme.title: Baby On Board
programme.desc: Angela Marks, an ambitious, image-conscious businesswoman working for over-demanding boss Mary. When Angela becomes unexpectedly pregnant at the peak of her career, her life with her divorce attorney husband, Curtis, is turned upside-down. An inconvenient pregnancy leads to a nine-month roller coaster ride as Angela and Curtis try to cope and the interference of best friends Danny and Sylvia escalate the situation into a full-on battle of the sexes...

programme.title: Masters of Love
programme.desc: Masters of Love' is a funny and moving look at the complications of modern love, friendship and dating, starring Edinburgh Festival Best Newcomer Ciarán Dowd ('Drunk History'). A group of friends are at different stages in their relationships and none of them are convinced about what they're doing: Emmy and Samantha are due to get married, Josh and Jenifer are breaking up and Niall is sleeping around but can any of them hold down a relationship?

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: Pup Star: Better 2Gether
programme.desc: Pup Star is back for an all-new adventure! After winning the canine competition show Pup Star and becoming an international pup sensation, Tiny, the adorable Yorkie, has her world turned upside down when an evil rival switches her out in competition with a street pup named Scrappy. The two pups find themselves living the others' very different life and an incredible journey through iconic cities ensues in this fun and hilarious dog-out-of-water adventure!

programme.title: Under The Lights - Pele
programme.desc: "How do you spell Pele? G-O-D", and that's because Pele is much more than a man, he had the gift of ubiquity on the field, he was a natural force, who became a national sentiment and a universal legend. The immeasurable titan of sports was born in Brazil, the Colossus of the South, on October 23, 1940, in the city of Tres Corais, in the south of the state of Minas Gerais. The child was baptized Edson Arantes do Nascimento, as his father chose his first name in honour of the scientist Thomas Edison. For his mother, he was simply Dico, but for history: Pele.

programme.title: Black September: Munich Olympics 1972
programme.desc: At dawn, on the 11th day of the XX Olympic Games in Munich, in 1972, 8 Palestinians of the terrorist group Black September climb over the fence surrounding the Olympic village. They head towards the Israeli team’s quarter. What happens thereafter is history: eleven Israeli athletes, one German policeman and five terrorists die in a bloodbath. The Munich massacre not only shocks the whole world but also launches a new era of international terrorism. This intense and gripping film provides entirely new perspectives and insights into this traumatizing event with never-before-seen footage of the victims and of the negotiations with the terrorists.

programme.title: War Matters
programme.desc: War Matters is a character driven documentary by London based production company CY Film Productions. The film chronicles 10 years of anti-war protest in the city of London through the story of Brian Haw, a veteran peace campaigner who challenged the UK Government's Middle East policy for over 10 years. The documentary also examines the British arms trade and the repercussions of the Iraq and Afghanistan wars around the world.

programme.title: The Age of Robots

programme.title: The Age of Robots
programme.desc: By the year 2050, three quarters of the world’s population will live in urban areas. programme.title: The Age of Robots

programme.title: The Age of Robots

programme.title: Bombing war : from Guernica to Hiroshima
programme.desc: The film takes us around the entire world, as no region was spared : the free countries, such as those occupied by Axis forces, as well as Italy, Germany and Japan. Seen from the skies, the war is revealed in a new light. It began in 1937 when Guernica and the Chinese cities of Chongqing and Shanghai were devastated by bombs and ended in August 1945 when the Americans dropped the first atomic on Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: MessiCirque
programme.desc: We will see the formative moments, the creative and artistic development, Messi´s participation with the project, training, rehearsals and the "Messi10 Challenge LaLiga". This is the interactive experience that lets you "be Messi for a day", ending with the long-awaited premiere of Messi10 in Barcelona. We will accompany the creators, artists and Messi on a trip from Montreal to Barcelona and discover a story about dreams that come true. MessiCirque combines Cirque du Soleil´s vision to tell, for the first time, the story of a living sports legend with a child´s ambition to play football.

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: Aina

Winner Accolades Global Film Competition.

programme.title: Antarctica - A Year On Ice
programme.desc: A visually stunning chronicle of what it is like to live in Antarctica for a full year, including the never before seen deep Antarctic winter, completely isolated from the rest of the world, while enduring months of unending darkness, in the coldest place on Earth.

programme.title: Chris Bonington, Mountaineer
programme.desc: From his rock climbing days in the UK through to visionary ascents on the high peaks of the Himalaya and shares the remarkable and poignant life of one of the world's best-known mountaineers.

programme.title: Isabela
programme.desc: A darker look at paradise in the Galapagos archipelago. Environmental artist and world traveller Billy Strong and Filmmaker / Photographer Dell Cullum, both from East Hampton, New York take an unauthorized journey and expedition onto never before landed locations of the Galapagos, to show the devastating effects of ocean-borne trash and debris on it’s shorelines.

programme.title: Living The Change

programme.title: Lost and Found Cowboy: Lost and Found Cowboy Season 1
programme.desc: Yukata Cowboy, a Japanese-American street performer, helps foreigners in Tokyo. He guides Cindy, an American dancer, through Japans cultural maze she inspires him to learn to dance. They begin to perform together and become romantically involved, but one day, Cindy suddenly, disappears. Yukata Cowboy now has to travel around the world to find his soul-mate...

programme.title: Lost and Found Cowboy Season 2: Lost and Found Cowboy Season 2
programme.desc: Spring 2020, as Covid 19 spreads across the globe, the whole world is under lockdown. Alone in his house in Tokyo, Yukata Cowboy sinks into depression over his girlfriend Cindys sudden departure from their life together. Isolated by Covid and Cindys disappearance, he becomes despondent. One day, his friends Lotte, a budding comedian in London, and Maribel, a flamenco dancer in Madrid, reach out to him over the internet. Realizing the state he is in, they team up together to encourage him to perform comedy and to learn flamenco - online. Though initially resistant, Yukata Cowboy eventually performs comedy successfully with Lotte for a Zoom audience and dances flamenco with Maribel and Lotte. From across the globe, they celebrate their strong ties of friendship, and conquer the loneliness of quarantine.

programme.title: Purgatory
programme.desc: Broken Bottles- With no doctor to tend to bullet wound, another member of the group falls, but not before offering some words of hope for the person who needed to hear it most. As Chris and Luke discuss how more and more of the signs point to Bobby as the one who locked them in there, things between Bobby and Lisa continue to approach a boiling point. While the bodies above ground continue to pile up for the Inspectors, below ground, an emotionally unstable Jessica has found a gun.

programme.title: Inside Television's Greatest: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The official I Love Lucy documentary that reveals little known facts about the conception, production and success of the television series "I Love Lucy."

programme.title: The Bay- The Beginning
programme.desc: Episode 6- Manny arrives at the wedding with a stunning date Tamara Garrett making Marly jealous of her cousin. Lee, not realizing his illegitimate daughter Lianna has followed him, arrives in the parking lot of an abandoned shack directly behind the Garrett Tavern where the mysterious voice ordered him to go. At the alter, Brian gets the shock of his life just as an explosion occurs across town.

programme.title: Tainted Dreams
programme.desc: Missteps Lead Everyone Astray- Kassandra & Max try to guilt Jordan & Angelica into going to a celeb-studded party but they want no part of it. So the two decide to go together. Peyton discovers she and her new husband don't share the same dreams. Anthony's plan to escape his mom by going to a speed dating event goes awry. Performing a poignant scene on the show makes Veronica reconsider giving Greg a second chance

programme.title: Purgatory
programme.desc: Broken Bottles- With no doctor to tend to bullet wound, another member of the group falls, but not before offering some words of hope for the person who needed to hear it most. programme.title: Curse of the Black Dahlia
programme.desc: A successful marketing executive working in a building erected on the very same lot where the mutilated body of a fallen actress was found back in 1947 is haunted by terrifying nightmares and vivid hallucinations in a dark thriller that brings Hollywood's darkest mystery screaming into the 21st Century.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Dublin- O'Donoghue's pub, the Ha' Penny Bridge, Powers Court Center, Oscar Wilde's old home. Laura stops at the National Museum of Ireland, the Temple Bar, and the banks of the River Liffey.

programme.title: Elizabeth Stanton's Great Big World
programme.desc: Olympic Games -Elizabeth and friends have some Olympic Games fun with long track speed skating, bobsled, National Ability Center, and Snow Tubing.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Malta- Laura visits a re-enactment of La Guardia, which represents a military performance that used to take place in the time of the Knights of St. John. Plus, the walled city of Mdina then Valletta Gozo, The Blue Grotto, St. Paul's Catacombs, and the Temple of Hagar Qim. Finally, Laura rounds out her trip with an excursion to Ggantia, the oldest free-standing structure in the world.

programme.title: Elizabeth Stanton's Great Big World
programme.desc: Park City-It's winter fun with Elizabeth and friends in Park City, Utah where they zip line, go on snowmobile adventures and cross country fun with snowshoeing.

programme.desc: A group of friends attends the wake of a child they accidentally killed in their car. Once in the wake, they find themselves trapped and stalked by a masked assailant.

programme.title: Trailblazers
programme.desc: Pop soul artist Mary Lambert teams with chef Renee Erickson for a gorgeous music and food pairing.

programme.title: Blow it Up
programme.desc: In a dangerous mission, pilot Doug Doherty flies along Russian airspace to transport volatile explosives to the island of St Lawrence. In Unk, Ben slams into a large bird mid-flight.

programme.title: My Mama's Kitchen
programme.desc: Nomarama goes behind the scenes with Moe Stevenson at Southern comfort food favorite, My Mama’s Kitchen.

programme.title: Blanca Food & Wine
programme.desc: Nomarama explores Blanca: Food and Wine.

programme.title: Sam's Texas Sub Shop
programme.desc: Nomarama learns about the Black & Blue brisket sandwich at Sam's Texas Sub Shop.

programme.title: Elation Brewing
programme.desc: Nomarama talks beer at Elation Brewing.

programme.title: El Rey 2
programme.desc: Tequila, tacos, AND homemade tortillas? Nomarama tests out some of the best tacos in town.

programme.title: BAR-Q and Bold Mariner
programme.desc: Nomarama is back in Norfolk's Ocean View beach neighborhood checking out BBQ and beer at BAR-Q and Bold Mariner Brewing.

programme.title: Tamarind
programme.desc: Nomarama ventures out to Military Highway to explore authentic Indian street food at Tamarind.

programme.title: Auntie's
programme.desc: Nomarama explores the tropical cocktails and bold flavors of the eclectic Filipino-Coastal American fare at Auntie’s.

programme.title: USA Through Film
programme.desc: American cities have long played a starring role in its cinema. Notable film directors tell personal stories about their favorite landscapes and cities.

programme.title: USA Through the Great Outdoors
programme.desc: Place is inextricably linked to who we are as human beings. See the American Great Outdoors in its purest and most authentic light – through the eyes of locals.

programme.title: Swiss Sandwiches Sausage
programme.desc: Guy stops in Portland, OR, and Charlotte, NC, to sample grilled cheese sandwiches with a twist, made-from-scratch sausages and specialties straight out of Switzerland.

programme.title: California Dreamers
programme.desc: Profiles people in California who are chasing their dreams and making them come true.

programme.title: Tundra Taxis
programme.desc: In Bethel, construction crews race to finish Era's newest hanger before the unforgiving winter snows arrive. But when Jim flies in to inspect the progress, he's far from happy.

programme.title: Greenhorn Ben
programme.desc: Pilot Yuri Ivanoff trains in Bethel for a potential promotion to fly the 208 Caravan. But danger strikes when heavy ice forms on the wings.

programme.title: America's Musical Journey
programme.desc: A cross-country adventure through the musical heritage of America and the cultural cities where America's music was born.

programme.title: Unwind The Palace Downtown, Dubai
programme.desc: Sabrina is at Dubai Downtown Palace Hotel, having its lavish suites designed magnificently with middle-eastern themes. She explores Bur Dubai and its traditional market. Then visits the Green Planet bio-dome and later Al Fahidi Fort, ending her day with dinner at Asado restaurant. Next she takes a boat ride down the Dubai canal, exploring the city’s skyline and ending with a visit to Ras Al Khor wildlife Sanctuary.

programme.title: Backpack Belgrade, Serbia
programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments built during the Roman, Hungarian and Turkish era.

programme.title: Boarding Pass Bronnoysund, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie Lowe goes hiking in the Troll Mountains at Brønnøysund, and uncovers the folklore associated with them. He also tries cod fishing.

programme.title: Unwind Nikara Yala, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds in Sri Lanka at a nature resort. She visits a 2200-year-old Buddhist temple, tries body boarding, explores the Yala National Park, enjoys a massage by the beach and cyles through the villages.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus Nicosia
programme.desc: While visiting Nicosia, the largest city in Cyprus, Sabrina has fun experiences such as experiencing a Turkish bath treatment in a Hammam and exploring the Troodos ranges.

programme.title: City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan(EN)
programme.desc: Travel with Alexandra, as she unravels the secrets of the ancient Uzbek city of Bukhara. From exploring the ancient fortress to local bazaars along with visiting a traditional carpet factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus Akamas National Park
programme.desc: Sabrina discovers the beauty of Akamas National Park, known for its Biodiversity. She also visits a donkey farm to learn about the country's national animal and its significance, and savours traditional Cypriot dishes.

programme.title: Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia. Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass Polar Park, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie Lowe meets some of Norway’s predators, including wolves, at the world’s northermost animal park, Polar Park.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus Paphos
programme.desc: Sabrina discover the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, uncovers stories at Paphos Archaeological Park, explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion, and tries kite surfing.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun Toronto, Canada
programme.desc: Alex Drobin gets to know the vibe of Toronto at significant spots such as Saint Lauren’s Market and Sir Henry’s Garage for Classic Cars.

programme.title: Backpack Pozarevac, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium, where she explores the National Museum, visits a mausoleum and concludes with exploring Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Asia Unplated with Diana Chan
programme.desc:
Asia Unplated follows Diana Chan as she explores the fresh, aromatic flavours of Asia. Each episode focuses on a different cuisine, showcasing a variety of traditional and modern dishes from each country.
Along the way, we join Diana as she explores the local shops, restaurants and markets, providing tips and advice for sourcing ingredients for each dish.
Then it’s back to her kitchen where Diana cooks up simple but authentic, home-style Asian dishes. She also invites special guests, friends and passionate foodies into the kitchen to show us their favourite recipes and chat about the unique cooking styles and rich food histories of their favorite Asian cuisines.

programme.title: Anjum's Spice Stories
programme.desc: There's not a curry in sight when Anjum serves up a selection of contemporary, bite-sized Indian snacks that both look and taste delicious.

programme.title: Is Anybody Out There?

It had a duration of 72 seconds and an intensity 30 times higher than usual. Named the WAW signal (as an engineer wrote ‘WOW’ on the data as it came in!), it is still being considered as one of the best examples of having being sent by intelligent extraterrestrial life. But, nothing has revolutionized the search of extra-terrestrial intelligent life as much as the recent discovery by the Kepler Satellite, of thousands of Earth-like planets where life could be possible.

programme.title: Scarlet Street
programme.desc: A box-office hit (despite being banned in three states), SCARLET STREET is one of legendary director Fritz Lang’s (M, Metropolis) finest American films. When middle-aged milquetoast Chris Cross (Edward G. Robinson, Double Indemnity) rescues street-walking bad girl Kitty (Joan Bennett) from the rain-slicked gutters of an eerily artificial back-lot Greenwich Village, he plunges into a whirlpool of lust, larceny and revenge. As Chris’ obsession with the irresistibly vulgar Kitty grows, the meek cashier is seduced, corrupted, humiliated and transformed into an avenging monster before implacable fate and perverse justice triumph in the most satisfyingly downbeat denouement in the history of American film. Dan Duryea, as Kitty’s pimp boyfriend, skillfully molds “a vicious and serpentine creature out of a cheap, chiseling tin horn.” (The New York Times). Packed with hairpin plot twists and “bristling with fine directorial touches and expert acting” (Time), SCARLET STREET is a dark gem of film noir

programme.title: Into the White
programme.desc: In World War II, the German pilots Lieutenant Horst Schopis, Josef Schwartz and Wolfgang Strunk crash their airplane in the wilderness of Norway after shooting down a British airplane. They walk through a snow storm until they reach shelter in an abandoned hunter cabin. Soon the British pilot Captain Charles P. Davenport and the gunner Robert Smith arrive in the cabin and they become prisoners of the German pilots. However, after the initial friction between the enemies, they realize that they should team-up to survive in the wilderness in the beginning of an improbable friendship.

programme.title: Nothing But The Truth
programme.desc: Thinking Pulitzer Prize and hoping to bring down a President, D.C. political columnist Rachel Armstrong writes that the President ignored the findings of a covert CIA operative when ordering air strikes against Venezuela. Rachel names the agent, Erica Van Doren, a woman whose young daughter is in Rachel's son's class at school. The government moves quickly to force Rachel to name her source. She's jailed for contempt when she refuses. She won't change her mind, and the days add up. Chaos descends on Van Doren's life as well. First Amendment versus national security, marriage and motherhood versus separation. What's the value of a principle?

Shorts of the week 1: Paddle to the Sea, If I was God, Animal Behaviour, The Bead Game
Bizarre: A Circus Story
programme.desc: 'Bizarre: A Circus Story' is a unique tale about passion, triumph and heartache. Part portraiture, it centers around Master Lu Yi, revered as the father of modern acrobatics. It follows his fascinating life story with all the victories, grief, and wisdom of a 75-year-old circus master. From his rise among the Communist Party as an acrobatic leader to his time as a prisoner during China's Cultural Revolution, Master Lu Yi's triumph to freedom is nothing short of a miracle. Known among his students as "Johnny Appleseed," he has been spreading his love and knowledge of the circus for over 50 years. Based at the Circus Center in the heart of San Francisco, he continues to build his legion of circus lovers. But it takes more than just talent and training to survive in the circus. It's grueling, competitive, and painful. 'Bizarre: A Circus Story' is also part performance based and features breathtaking performances by members of the circus community, from world-renowned performers to youth.

programme.title: A Medicine for the Mind

programme.title: 'Master Harold' ... And the Boys
programme.desc: This movie is of Hally, an adolescent white South African. He is stuck between his intolerant father's outlook of him and those of his caretaker, Sam. Sam is a black waiter and Hally's friend and teacher. Hally is required to laugh at his father's racist jokes, by contrast, Sam exposes Hally to uplifting experiences. One day Hally was terribly humiliated by his father and Sam shows Hally how to be proud of something he can achieve.

programme.title: Hot Air
programme.desc: HOT AIR is a timely, slick, hilarious and heartfelt comedy-drama from Frank Coraci, director of The Wedding Singer and The Waterboy, starring Steve Coogan, Taylor Russell, and Neve Campbell. Lionel Macomb has been the reigning king of conservative talk radio, delighting his fans and enraging his opponents with his angry charisma and caustic wit. He has his perfect world turned upside down when his 16-year-old niece, Tess, shows up seeking help with a family crisis. In Tess, Lionel has finally met his match: a smart, determined, brazenly honest sparring partner who forces Lionel to confront the complicated family he left behind.

programme.title: Mozart and the Whale
programme.desc: A charming and heartfelt romantic drama starring Josh Hartnett and Radha Mitchell. New York taxi driver Donald Morton has Asperger's syndrome, a type of autism. Proficient with numbers but shy around people, Donald organizes a support group for others with his condition. Isabelle Sorenson, who is direct to a fault and practical, but easily upset by any perceived insult, joins the group. The two fall in love, but their mutual difficulty in coping with their condition threatens their fragile relationship.

programme.title: Love Me Like You Do
programme.desc: Ryan Brenner is a traveling musician, and Jackie Laurel is a fallen country music star who is a recently single mother, battling to hold on to her young daughter. When the free-spirited pair meet by chance, they soon form an unlikely relationship that will teach them to trust and love again, and may change their lives forever.

programme.title: The Face of Love
programme.desc: Five years after the death of her beloved husband Garrett (Ed Harris), Nikki (Annette Bening) meets Tom, a man who who looks exactly like her deceased husband. Not only does Tom possess the same physical characteristics, but he also shares Garrett's kindness, humour, and passion for art. Suddenly, a flood of old feelings rush back to Nikki: she's met the love of her life. Again.

programme.title: The Book of Love
programme.desc: When Penny, the light of Henry’s life, is killed in a car crash, he puts everything on hold as he tries to come to terms with his loss. When his bereavement leave is over, everyone expects straight-laced Henry to return to work. But now everything has changed and Henry is not going back. Before Penny got in the car the day of her death, she asked Henry to keep an eye out for Millie, an extraordinary vagrant girl she’d seen collecting plastic bottles and other scraps around their neighbourhood. At the time, Henry agreed just to indulge his wife, but this promise soon becomes his last remaining connection to Penny, and nothing else matters.

programme.title: Kill Zone 2
programme.desc: Undercover cop Kit (Wu Jing) becomes a junkie in order to catch Mr Hung (Louis Koo), the mastermind behind a crime syndicate. When the operation goes sour and Kit blows his cover, his supervisor and uncle Wah (Simon Yam) decides to terminate the operation. When Kit disappears without a trace, Wah defies the order from his commanding officer and tracks Kit to a prison in Thailand.

programme.title: Jimmy P
programme.desc: A troubled Native American veteran forms an extraordinary friendship with his maverick French psychoanalyst as they try to find a cure to his suffering.

programme.title: Dark Minds
programme.desc: A twisted psychological thriller about a man haunted by his past. After Josh (Zachary Quinto – 'Star Trek') experiences a series of hallucinations involving his brother (Jon Hamm – 'Baby Driver'), he places himself in the care of a young therapist Emily (Jenny Slate – 'Obvious Child'). As Emily is forced to wade deeper and deeper into Josh’s psyche, she fights to discover the truth.

programme.title: Barely Lethal
programme.desc: Megan Walsh is a teenage special ops agent who yearns for a normal adolescence. After faking her own death she assumes the role of an exchange student and quickly learns that surviving the treacherous waters of a typical American high school can be even more difficult than international espionage. Jam-packed with action from the cafeteria to the battleground, and with hilarious performances from Samuel L. Jackson, Jessica Alba and Sophie Turner, Barely Lethal is the unmissable action comedy that shows just how hard surviving high school really is!

programme.title: Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Mariah Mundi’s life is turned upside down when his younger brother is kidnapped from the streets of Victorian London. Following a trail of clues to the darkly majestic Prince Regent Hotel, Mariah discovers a hidden realm of child-stealing monsters, sinister strangers, deadly secrets and a long-lost artifact that grants limitless wealth – but also devastating supernatural power. With the fate of his world, and his family at stake, Mariah will risk everything to unravel the Curse of the Midas Box!
